block.name: Deinterleave
block.doc: Deinterleave interleaved input streams. The input values will be assigned in turn to out0, out1, ..., out(N-1). Note that the data rate at the output is the input rate divided by the number of streams.

param.name: IO Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the input and output streams.

option.name: Complex
option.doc: Input and output streams are complex.

option.name: Float
option.doc: Input and output streams are real.

option.name: Int
option.doc: Input and output streams are 32-bit integer.

option.name: Short
option.doc: Input and output streams are 16-bit integer.

option.name: Byte
option.doc: Input and output streams are 8-bit byte.

param.name: Num Streams
param.doc: Specifies the number of streams to deinterleave.

param.name: Vec Length
param.doc: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
